description:
Marquis Blumrush is one of the six leaders of the Six Great Nobles of http://anidb.net/ch95431 [Re-Estize Kingdom]. However, he is secretly betraying the Kingdom by leaking information to the http://anidb.net/ch95432 [Baharuth Empire] for monetary gain.
Source: Overlord Wiki
name: Blumrush-kou
